Config.Name: Web UI for solving CAPTCHAs manually
Config.Description: Port for web UI and API access. Use this to manually solve CAPTCHAs if not using SponsorsHelper.

Config.Name: Config folder
Config.Description: Persistent configuration storage for Quasarr settings and state.

Config.Name: Internal Address
Config.Description: Required. Full URL including protocol and port. Must be reachable by Radarr, Sonarr, and LazyLibrarian.

Config.Name: External Address
Config.Description: Optional. For reverse proxy setups. Always protect external access with authentication.

Config.Name: Discord Webhook
Config.Description: Optional. Discord webhook URL for notifications about CAPTCHA links and download status.

Config.Name: Hostnames URL
Config.Description: Optional. Public raw text URL containing valid hostnames (one per line as 'key = value'). Must be HTTP/HTTPS raw text, not HTML or JSON.

Config.Name: Auth Mode
Config.Description: Authentication mode. Use 'form' for session-based login or 'basic' for HTTP Basic Authentication.

Config.Name: Username
Config.Description: Username for authentication. Required when using form-based or basic authentication.

Config.Name: Password
Config.Description: Password for authentication. Required when using form-based or basic authentication.

Config.Name: Silent Mode
Config.Description: Optional. Set to True to silence all Discord notifications except SponsorsHelper errors.

Config.Name: Debug Mode
Config.Description: Optional. Set to True to enable verbose debug logging for troubleshooting.

Config.Name: Timezone
Config.Description: Optional. Timezone (e.g., Europe/Berlin). Incorrect values may cause HTTPS/SSL certificate validation issues.
